name: Horror Loop
description:
Horror Loop tells the deep and unique story of a soldier.

Realism


At TWISTED UNIVERSE, we did our best to make the character hold objects in a very realistic and natural way.
We also used the latest game engine, Unreal Engine 5.2, to make the game's lighting, textures, and shadows look their best.
We did our best to create as realistic environments as possible, and to provide a realistic sound experience.
In order to make the atmosphere of the game much more realistic, the HUD is not displayed throughout the game.
Interactions do not require any menu interaction as we have made zero HUDs specifically to the game.

Gameplay


Horror Loop is played with a first person character and we experience the whole story through the eyes of the character.
Horror Loop manipulates the player as little as possible to increase the sense of exploration.
To keep the player tense at every moment of the game, there are enemies chasing the player.

Language Support


Horror Loop supports 31 languages.
The game has 31 language support in order to reach as many people as possible and spread it to wide geographies.

Chapters


The game consists of 3 parts in total.
The first of these sections is the Home section.
In the house section, the player is in a loop, trying to get out of the house by overcoming various difficulties.
The second part is the Hospital part.
In the hospital section, there is a butcher chasing the player after him.
The player tries to escape from the hospital by overcoming various difficulties and escaping from the butcher.
The third section is the Cave section.
In the cave section, the Player learns what is going on with the notes they find around.
Also, there are creatures chasing the player.
